VALIDATION.PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password must be at least 12 characters long.
VALIDATION.NO_UPPERCASE_CHAR: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
VALIDATION.NO_LOWER_CHAR: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
VALIDATION.NO_SPECIAL_CHARACTER: Password must contain at least one special character.
VALIDATION.PASSWORDS_MISMATCH: The passwords provided are not identical.

AUTH.SIGN_UP_SUCCESS_INFO: We have sent you an email with an activation link for your account. After visiting this link, you will be able to log in.
AUTH.EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE: Email address is already in use.
